title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 7000.21 - Construction of regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 7000.21 - Construction of regulations

State Regulations

This Part shall be liberally construed to accomplish the
objectives of the fund and the policies of the trustees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
7000.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
